text: The Killers is a 1946 American film noir (crime movie) directed by Robert Siodmak and based on the 1927 short story of the same name by Ernest Hemingway. It stars Burt Lancaster, Ava Gardner, Edmond O'Brien, and Sam Levene and was distributed by Universal Pictures. == Other websites == * * * Category:1946 crime movies Category:1940s American crime movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Film noir Category:Movies directed by Robert Siodmak
title: The Killers (1946 movie)
